name: Iceberg 3
description:
Candle smoke on Hahnemuhle Bristol Board (920GSM)

The original artwork is included and will be shipped by recorded post

Artwork size: 297mm x 210mm (A4)

Using the ancient technique of ‘fumage’, this form of art can be found in the cave paintings of our ancestors from many thousands of years ago. By using a simple candle flame, the sooty marks formed by the fire resemble the strata and shadows of ice. 

Signed on the reverse
